downloadTitle: Microsoft Exchange 2010 Unified Messaging PBX Configuration Note for Cisco Unified Communications Manager 7.0
downloadDescription: This PBX configuration note contains information about deploying Exchange 2010 UM RTM and Service Pack 1 (SP1) with a Cisco Unified Communication Manager 7.0 using direct SIP connection. The PBX configuration note contains configuration settings that are specific to Cisco Unified Communications Manager 7.0.
detailsSection:
This download contains the PBX configuration note for Microsoft Exchange 2007 Unified Messaging with:
  • PBX Vendor: Cisco
  • PBX model: Unified Communications Manager 7.0
  • PBX software: 7.0.2.20000-5
  • Protocol: Direct SIP Connection
  • Also applicable to Cisco Unified Communications Manager 6.0
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
